policies.name: s3-no-public-read
policies.description: Prohibits setting the publicRead or publicReadWrite permission on AWS S3 buckets.

policies.name: s3-bucket-replication-enabled
policies.description: Encourages use of cross-region replication for S3 buckets.

policies.name: prohibited-public-internet
policies.description: Ingress with public internet access are prohibited

olds.content:
description: |
  *Some description*

schemaVersion: '0.3'
assumeRole: '{{ AutomationAssumeRole }}'
parameters:
  AutomationAssumeRole:
    type: String
    default: 'arn:aws:iam::616138583583:role/ssmAutomation-role'
    description: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
  InstanceId:
    type: String
    description: (Required) AMI Source EC2 instance ID
  Region:
    type: String
    description: AWS Region
    default: 'us-west-2'
mainSteps:
  ##############################################################################
  - name: 'Wait_for_SSM_Agent'
    description: SSM Agent Needs to be Ready
    action: aws:waitForAwsResourceProperty
    timeoutSeconds: 3600
    inputs:
      Service: ssm
      Api: DescribeInstanceInformation
      InstanceInformationFilterList:
        - key: InstanceIds
          valueSet: ['{{ InstanceId }}']
      PropertySelector: '$..PingStatus'
      DesiredValues:
        - Online
    isCritical: 'true'
olds.name: nodeBuildRunbook
